enemy.data.hag.name: Hag
enemy.data.hag.description.visuals: Flabby green humanoid looking creature. Wearing a torn robe and hoodie with spikes coming out of its back. Face and neck are really fat and flabby. Long pointy ears and fangs. Holding on to a staff with a dragon skull attached to it. Multiple ornmental skulls hanging from its body or attached to its dorsal spikes.
